description: Food Security Recovery and Sustainable Livelihood

subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description: The purpose of this project is to contribute to the development and implementation of policies strategies and coordination mechanisms that lead to food and nutrition security and sustainable livelihoods, ensuring a smooth transition between humanitarian responses and longer-term development. The Specific Results includes.  1) Enhanced coordination for recovery, food security and longer term development;  2)  Social mobilization and community level participation for enhanced DRM management, food security and sustainable livelihood;      3) Enhanced livelihoods of resettled populations ;    4) Advocacy for policies/strategies that link emergency, recovery and longer term development.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Food Security and  Recovery
